title: "Smile for the camera! AI and machine learning help railway’s cutest neighbours, thanks to Network Rail, ZSL and Google Cloud partnership"
excerpt: "Network Rail’s railway land is home to a variety of plant and animal species, few of which are as cute as these dormice. The railway company’s Southern region is working in partnership with ZSL (Zoological Society of London) to explore innovative ways to better understand and monitor what species are living along the railway."
